statements: DELETE FROM player_location WHERE longitude > 0 AND latitude < 0;
DELETE FROM player_location WHERE longitude < -90 AND latitude > 40;
DELETE FROM PlayerInventory WHERE item_id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM PlayerInventory WHERE quantity < 10 OR player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM PlayerStats WHERE health <= 50);
DELETE FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 123456 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_map WHERE location_id = 789 AND (latitude < 0 OR longitude > 0);
